exceptions.exn: The LHS of valid_fresh (valid (_ \\+ fresh _ \\\\-> _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. unfold valid. rewrite !valid_fresh. intros H. apply (pleq_validR _ _ (fresh _)). - apply validAR in H. apply validAL in H. apply validAR in H. apply H. - apply validUnPtV in H. apply H.
